input: This skin in not entirely black/white; it's more dark gray/white. It's much better looking in person. It arrived quickly and love how it looks.
Xtreme guard is perfect for my tablet, and I love the one I have on my phone too.  I highly recommend this product!
target: Xtreme guard is perfect for my tablet
